summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 9, University Gardens Addition, being the alley between 38th Ave. Northeast and 39th Ave. Northeast from Northeast 60th Street to Northeast 62nd Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 19242 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installment notes.
